titles: The golde[n] boke of christen matrimonye moost necessary [and] profitable for all the[m], that entend to liue quietly and godlye in the Christen state of holy wedlock newly set forthe in English by Theodore Basille.
author: Bullinger, Heinrich, 1504-1575.
Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.
Coverdale, Miles, 1488-1568.
publisher: In Botulph lane at the sygne of the whyte Beare, by Ioh[a]n Mayler for Ioh[a]n Gough,
notes: A translation by Miles Coverdale of: Bullinger, Heinrich.  Der Christlich Eestand.
Has both author's and Becon's prefaces.  Is of STC variant (b).
Running title reads: The christen state of matrimony.
Identified as STC 1724 on UMI microfilm, reel 71.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Marriage --  Religious aspects --  Christianity --  Early works to 1800.
